Develop an AI-powered productivity app that analyzes users' workflows and provides personalized recommendations for streamlining tasks.
Create a virtual reality (VR) environment that simulates the experience of completing tasks in a futuristic, high-tech workspace.
Develop a brain-computer interface (BCI) that allows users to control their computer or smartphone with their thoughts.
Create a personalized task management system that uses blockchain technology to provide transparency and accountability.
Develop a wearable device that uses biofeedback to help users manage stress and stay focused.
